
## Longitudinal Cumulative Mass Change

```{r long-cum-MASS-change, echo = FALSE}
# expects parameters file1, file2, type1, type2
lcmc1 = read_lcmc(file1, type1, grain.classes, grain.rows)
lcmc2 = read_lcmc(file2, type2, grain.classes, grain.rows)
lcmc.diff = diff_lcmc(lcmc1, lcmc2)
lcmc.rmse.time = rmse_lcmc(lcmc.diff, "Time")

lcmc.diff %>%
  mutate(Station = as.numeric(str_extract(Station, "[0-9]+"))) %>%
  ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = diff_lcmc, color = GrainClass) + geom_line() +
  ylab("Difference") +
  ggtitle("Longitudinal Cumulative Mass Change Differences at Stations") +
  facet_wrap( ~ Time)
lcmc.diff %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Time, y = diff_lcmc, fill = GrainClass) +
  geom_boxplot() + facet_wrap( ~ GrainClass) +
  ylab("Difference") +
  ggtitle("Longitudinal Cumulative Mass Change Differences")
lcmc.rmse.time %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = GrainClass, y = rmse_lcmc, fill = GrainClass) +
  geom_col(color = "black") + ylab("RMSE") +
  facet_wrap( ~ factor(Time, levels = rev(sort(unique(Time))))) + 
  ggtitle("Longitudinal Cumulative Mass Change RMSE by Grain Class")
```
